00001 #define _wcs_h_
00002 #define WCS_PIX -1      /* Pixel WCS */
00003 #define WCS_LIN  0      /* Linear projection */
00004 #define WCS_AZP  1      /* Zenithal/Azimuthal Perspective */
00005 #define WCS_TAN  2      /* Gnomonic = Tangent Plane */
00006 #define WCS_SIN  3      /* Orthographic/synthesis */
00007 #define WCS_STG  4      /* Stereographic */
00008 #define WCS_ARC  5      /* Zenithal/azimuthal equidistant */
00009 #define WCS_ZPN  6      /* Zenithal/azimuthal PolyNomial */
00010 #define WCS_ZEA  7      /* Zenithal/azimuthal Equal Area */
00011 #define WCS_AIR  8      /* Airy */
00012 #define WCS_CYP  9      /* CYlindrical Perspective */
00013 #define WCS_CAR 10      /* Cartesian */
00014 #define WCS_MER 11      /* Mercator */
00015 #define WCS_CEA 12      /* Cylindrical Equal Area */
00016 #define WCS_CPS 13      /* Conic PerSpective (COP) */
00017 #define WCS_COD 14      /* COnic equiDistant */
00018 #define WCS_COE 15      /* COnic Equal area */
00019 #define WCS_COO 16      /* COnic Orthomorphic */
00020 #define WCS_BON 17      /* Bonne */
00021 #define WCS_PCO 18      /* Polyconic */
00022 #define WCS_GLS 19      /* Sanson-Flamsteed (GLobal Sinusoidal) */
00023 #define WCS_PAR 20      /* Parabolic */
00024 #define WCS_AIT 21      /* Hammer-Aitoff */
00025 #define WCS_MOL 22      /* Mollweide */
00026 #define WCS_CSC 23      /* COBE quadrilateralized Spherical Cube */
00027 #define WCS_QSC 24      /* Quadrilateralized Spherical Cube */
00028 #define WCS_TSC 25      /* Tangential Spherical Cube */
00029 #define WCS_NCP 26      /* Special case of SIN */
00030 #define WCS_DSS 27      /* Digitized Sky Survey plate solution */
00031 #define WCS_PLT 28      /* Plate fit polynomials (SAO) */
00032 #define WCS_TNX 29      /* Gnomonic = Tangent Plane (NOAO with corrections) */
00033 #define WCS_GALACTIC    3       /* Galactic longitude and latitude */
00034 #define WCS_ECLIPTIC    4       /* Ecliptic longitude and latitude */
00035 #define WCS_ALTAZ       5       /* Azimuth and altitude/elevation */
00036 #define WCS_LINEAR      6       /* Linear with optional units */
00037 #define WCS_NPOLE       7       /* Longitude and north polar angle */
00038 #define WCS_SPA         8       /* Longitude and south polar angle */
00039 #ifndef PI
00040 #define PI      3.141592653589793238462643
00041 #endif
00042 #define degrad(x)       ((x)*PI/180.)
00043 #define raddeg(x)       ((x)*180./PI)
00044 #define hrdeg(x)        ((x)*15.)
00045 #define deghr(x)        ((x)/15.)
00046 #define hrrad(x)        degrad(hrdeg(x))
00047 #define radhr(x)        deghr(raddeg(x))
00048 #define  TNX_CHEBYSHEV    1
00049 #define  TNX_LEGENDRE     2
00050 #define  TNX_POLYNOMIAL   3
00051 #define TNX_XNONE       0       /* no x-terms (old no) */
00052 #define TNX_XFULL       1       /* full x-terms (new yes) */
00053 #define TNX_XHALF       2       /* half x-terms (new) */
